plot: The life story of Damien Parer, the acclaimed World War II photographer, who spent most of the war on the frontline.
title: Reportero de guerra
plot_es: The life story of Damien Parer, the acclaimed World War II photographer, who spent most of the war on the frontline.
original_name: Fragments of War: The Story of Damien Parer
plot_en: The life story of Damien Parer, the acclaimed World War II photographer, who spent most of the war on the frontline.
